Welcome to the Graphical User Interface

Select a function widget from the Function Menu on the left over there to get started or check out some of the resources below.

Information

scrilla is a financial analysis application. It can calculate a variety of statistics and generate graphical summaries of historical data. Tabular summaries can be saved to your local file system in json or csv format, while graphical summaries can be saved in jpeg format.

Data is retrieved from several external sources, such as AlphaVantage, Quandl and IEX. You will need to register for API keys and give them to scrilla before it will be able to pull data and perform calculations.

Configuration

Register for API keys using the following links

  • AlphaVantage
  • Quandl
  • IEX
Once you have your keys, add them to scrilla through the menu bar option Account > Add API Key. Keep in mind, if you are using the free tier keys, the API rate limits can affect the speed of the application.
